A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I actually really enjoyed this new installment in the Star Wars saga. It took many twists and turns I didn't expect and had great and memorable scenes and characters. I have one or two negatives but I also have many positives. I think director Rian Johnson did a great job with this film. This film can feel very odd at first but in my second viewing I understood and enjoyed it much more then my first. The film still left us a few more questions that will hopefully be answered in the next chapter.
